version_name: 4.1:**LastPass is now FREE on iOS!**We heard you loud and clear. You can install LastPass on your iPhone
4.1:**LastPass is now FREE on iOS!**We heard you loud and clear. You can install LastPass on your iPhone

version_description: Minor bugfixes and improvements.
Minor bugfixes and improvements.

We continue to make small changes focused on improving your LastPass experience. Specific updates in version 4.1.3:
• Swipe actions are back. Now you can get quick access to popular features like Copy Password and Copy Username.
• Progress indicato

We continue to make small changes focused on improving your LastPass experience. Specific updates in version 4.1.3:
• Swipe actions are back. Now you can get quick access to popular features like Copy Password and Copy Username.
• Progress indicato

We've implemented a few bug fixes and improvements based on your feedback with v4.1.4. Specifically:
• Resolved an issue that was causing some users to have to type their master password after authenticating with Touch ID.
• Improved visibility of t

We've implemented a few bug fixes and improvements based on your feedback with v4.1.4. Specifically:
• Resolved an issue that was causing some users to have to type their master password after authenticating with Touch ID.
• Improved visibility of t

v4.1.5 of LastPass re-introduces swipe gestures in the vault:
• Swipe from the right to view vault items.
• Swipe from the left to share or manage sharing for vault items.
• There's still the Copy Password shortcut on every site. Users of newer i

v4.1.5 of LastPass re-introduces swipe gestures in the vault:
• Swipe from the right to view vault items.
• Swipe from the left to share or manage sharing for vault items.
• There's still the Copy Password shortcut on every site. Users of newer i

New year, new us! Our resolution in 2017 is to continue making LastPass the best way to simplify your digital life. This version includes several important fixes to issues reported by our users:
• Improved handling of Auto Logout settings when you res

New year, new us! Our resolution in 2017 is to continue making LastPass the best way to simplify your digital life. This version includes several important fixes to issues reported by our users:
• Improved handling of Auto Logout settings when you res
This version squashes a bug that was causing a blank screen on iPads for some users. Thanks to everyone who reported this issue!
This version squashes a bug that was causing a blank screen on iPads for some users. Thanks to everyone who reported this issue!

- Added multi-word search capability in the vault.

With this release, we improved the YubiKey 2-factor authentication flow. We also fixed some outstanding issues in the AutoFill feature that prevented some users from saving new entries on the fly.

Dark Mode is now available in the LastPass app! This release features a refreshed light theme and all-new dark theme.

If you have Dark Mode enabled on your iPhone, you will automatically see the LastPass app in Dark Mode the next time you login.
